name: Distributed Consciousness
description: Distributed Consciousness mixes NFT technology and custom AI software created by the artist to question artificial intelligence, ecology, sustainability, consciousness and free will - just like the works in this Constellation.

key_work.title: Distributed Consciousness
key_work.credit_line:
Memo Akten

Eight-channel video installation, LED Strips, custom software using Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, Generative Adversarial Networks, Transformers, CLIP, VQGAN, GPT3

20 mins
key_work.material_description:
Eight-channel video installation, LED Strips, custom software using Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, Generative Adversarial Networks, Transformers, CLIP, VQGAN, GPT3

20 mins, every 20 mins on the hour
key_work.brief_description: Distributed Consciousness began as an NFT collection on the eco-friendly Tezos blockchain. The 256 images of cephalopods, inspired by the artist’s time spent snorkeling off Turkey’s Mediterranean coastline, were created using custom AI software coded by the artist.

constellations_primary.name: Distributed Consciousness
constellations_primary.description: Distributed Consciousness mixes NFT technology and custom AI software created by the artist to question artificial intelligence, ecology, sustainability, consciousness and free will - just like the works in this Constellation.

end.title: WALL·E
end.brief_description: WALL·E is the last robot left on an Earth that has been overrun with garbage and all humans have fled to outer space. For 700 years he has continued to try and clean up the mess, but has developed some rather interesting human-like qualities.

constellations_other.name: Distributed Consciousness
constellations_other.description: Distributed Consciousness mixes NFT technology and custom AI software created by the artist to question artificial intelligence, ecology, sustainability, consciousness and free will - just like the works in this Constellation.

constellations_other.name: Plants and people
constellations_other.description: Plants can be characters in stories, and we often project human qualities onto them, but how do they see the world?

constellations_other.name: Silent adventures (Hollow Knight - Education)
constellations_other.description: Videogames, film and TV usually rely on the spoken word to communicate character and story. It wasn’t always this way. Although we may think of ‘silent films’ as in the past, there are contemporary videogames and films that shy away from using the spoken word.

links.description: Pixar’s robot-hero Wall-E, was designed to clean up a garbage piled earth after humans had long since departed for the skies. Beginning his journey as a simple mobile waste unit, Wall-E develops sentience, falls in love and saves humanity.

end.title: I Am Mother
end.creator_credit: Michael Lloyd Green, Kelvin Munro, Timothy White, Rhea Films and Grant Sputore

video_links.name: I AM MOTHER | Official Trailer | Netflix

end.brief_description: A teenage girl is raised underground by a robot “Mother”, designed to repopulate the earth following an extinction event. But their unique bond is threatened when an inexplicable stranger arrives with alarming news.

constellations_other.name: Distributed Consciousness
constellations_other.description: Distributed Consciousness mixes NFT technology and custom AI software created by the artist to question artificial intelligence, ecology, sustainability, consciousness and free will - just like the works in this Constellation.

links.description: After a global catastrophic event, an android Mother is left to repopulate the planet with human embryos which are grown and then cared for. Mother is raising Daughter, but all is not what is seems as Mother desires perfection and is not afraid to try and try again till success is achieved.

links.description: An early example of generative AI art was created by British painter Harold Cohen in 1973. AARON was a computer system that could generate drawings and paintings. AARON produced works that Cohen would then work on creating human-machine collaborative artworks.

end.title: Detroit: Become Human
end.brief_description: Detroit: Become Human puts the destiny of both mankind and androids in your hands, taking you to a near future where machines have become more intelligent than humans. Every choice you make affects the outcome of the game, with one of the most intricately branching narratives ever created.

constellations_other.name: Distributed Consciousness
constellations_other.description: Distributed Consciousness mixes NFT technology and custom AI software created by the artist to question artificial intelligence, ecology, sustainability, consciousness and free will - just like the works in this Constellation.

links.description: Adventure videogame, Detroit: Become Human similarly examines what happens when androids become sentient through its three robot protagonists. With the narrative developing according to player decisions, the game was praised for complex character branches and meaningful choice in gameplay.

end.title: Astro Boy
end.brief_description: In the year 2000, Dr. Boyton creates a super-robot in his deceased son’s image. He calls the robot Astro Boy. Astro Boy can swim oceans, leap over mountains, even fly into space on his own power. However, Astro Boy can’t replace his son.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs, influence and inspiration
constellations_other.description: A tradition of influence and inspiration beginning with Eisenstein.

constellations_other.name: Distributed Consciousness
constellations_other.description: Distributed Consciousness mixes NFT technology and custom AI software created by the artist to question artificial intelligence, ecology, sustainability, consciousness and free will - just like the works in this Constellation.

constellations_other.name: 9.5mm Pathe-Baby and parents behaving badly
constellations_other.description: A look at the link between the Pathé-Baby system and animation, as well as the relationship between cinematic parents and their children.

links.description: Set in a world where humans and robots co-exist, Astro Boy follows the story of a robot boy with human emotions. Considered to be one of the greatest manga and anime series of all time, Astro Boy has starred in countless film and television adaptations.

start.title: Astro Boy

end.title: Humans
end.creator_credit: Kate Gill, Vicki Delow, AMC Studios, Channel 4 Television, Kudos and Hayden Matthews
end.brief_description: In a parallel present where the latest must-have gadget for any busy family is a ‘Synth’ - a highly-developed robotic servant that’s so similar to a real human it’s transforming the way we live.

constellations_other.name: Distributed Consciousness
constellations_other.description: Distributed Consciousness mixes NFT technology and custom AI software created by the artist to question artificial intelligence, ecology, sustainability, consciousness and free will - just like the works in this Constellation.

links.description: Also exploring the relationship between humans and AI, Humans based on Swedish science fiction drama Real Humans, unravels the social, cultural and psychological implications of developing anthropomorphic robots or synths. It was later developed for Chinese broadcaster Tencent.
